/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees and power lines add a touch of nature and modernity to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
